speaker: Juhani Lehtimaki, Pierluigi Rufo
title: How To Bring A Product To Reality In A Few Days
description: How a seamless cooperation can lead into a new wave of very rapid prototyping

speaker: Paul Hudson
title: Core ML for everyone
description: Create ML and Core ML provide a powerful duo that can add functionality to your app in just a few minutes

speaker: Marcos Placona
title: IoT – Beyond prototyping
description: Will walk you through the process of turning a tangle of wires on a breadboard into a product

speaker: Resul Caner Yildirim
title: Can The Material Design Live Long And Prosper?
description: Can Material Design solve our problems? Do we use it as it should be? How can we implement MD to our projects?

speaker: Yoichi Tagaya
title: Dependency Injection Pattern for iOS Apps
description: In this talk, the original author of Swinject, the most popular DI framework for Swift/iOS, will introduce DI pattern for iOS apps.

speaker: Marcin Moskała
title: Superpowers of Property Delegation
description: Let's dive into possibilities that Kotlin delegation gives. Let’s discover property delegation and understand its superpowers.

speaker: Zan Markan
title: The State of The Kotlin Ecosystem
description: Let's see what is the state of Kotlin nowadays and what is hot in the K universe.

speaker: Marcin Krzyzanowski
title: Stories from the crypt(ography)
description: Let's learn how to encrypt, what is a cipher, how to use AES or message authentication and deep dive into basic cryptography.

speaker: Cyril Mottier
title: Themes, styles & more: from zero to hero
description: Let's talk how to customize your Android application, reduce duplication in your code and make your styles cleaner.

speaker: Svyatoslav Scherbina
title: Using Kotlin to share code between iOS and Android
description: Svyatoslav will share his knowledge about the state of Kotlin Native project from a first hand expirience.
